description.en: Provides unlimited nitro booster increasing your flying speed by up to 30%. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.ar: Provides unlimited nitro booster increasing your flying speed by up to 30%. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.br: Provides unlimited nitro booster increasing your flying speed by up to 30%. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.cns: Provides unlimited nitro booster increasing your flying speed by up to 30%. To use, double click while mounted and press the <X> Key to toggle the boost on or off.
description.de: Bietet einen unbegrenzten Nitro-Booster, der die Fluggeschwindigkeit um bis zu 30% erhöht. Um ihn zu verwenden, doppelklicke auf dem Mount und drücke die <X>-Taste, um den Boost ein- oder auszuschalten.

description.fr: Permet d'augmenter la vitesse de vol de 30%. Pour l'utiliser : double-cliquez dessus en vol et appuyez sur <X> pour activer ou désactiver le boost.

description.jp: 飛行速度を最大30%向上させる無制限のニトロブースターを提供します。使用するには、マウント中にダブルクリックし、<X>キーを押してブーストのオンとオフを切り替えます。

description.sp: Proporciona Refuerzo Nitro Definitivo aumentando tu velocidad de vuelo hasta un 30%. Para usarlo, haga doble clic mientras está montado y presione la tecla <X> para activar o desactivar el impulso.
